H0.text: In which English county is the town of Oswestry. Shropshire

H1.text: In which English county is the town of Oswestry. Cheshire

H2.text: In which English county is the town of Oswestry. Staffordshire

H3.text: In which English county is the town of Oswestry. Salop

A4.text: Oswestry ( OZ-w…ôss-tree; Welsh: Croesoswallt) is a market town, civil parish and historic railway town in Shropshire, England, close to the Welsh border.
